## cilium-operator status clustermesh

Display status of remote clusters

```
cilium-operator status clustermesh [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                    help for clustermesh
  -o, --output string           json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
  -s, --server-address string   Address of the operator API server (default "localhost:9234")
      --verbose                 Output verbose status information for ready clusters as well
```

* [cilium-operator status](cilium-operator_status.md)	 - Display status of operator
